application.algorithms.cof.CofConfigurator module

class application.algorithms.cof.CofConfigurator.CofConfigurator(data_file: str = 'multi-dataset.csv', model_name: str = 'model.pkl', report_file: str = 'report.csv', seed: int = 42, contamination: float = 0.1, n_neighbors: int = 20, method: str = 'fast')[source]

Bases: AlgorithmConfigurator

Configuration class for the COF algorithm.

contamination

The amount of contamination of the data set, i.e., the proportion of outliers in the data set. Defaults to 0.1.

Type:

float

n_neighbors

Number of neighbors to use. Defaults to 20.

Type:

int

method

Method to use for the COF algorithm. Defaults to “fast”.

Type:

str

contamination: float = 0.1
method: str = 'fast'
n_neighbors: int = 20
